document_data.mainbody:
Combat readiness was a spell that enabled the subject to act more rapidly in combat.
When the spell was cast, the subjects eyes widened and briefly shone white. Thereafter, until the spells duration ended in a minute or more, the subject gained an increased reaction time at the beginning of a combat encounter.
The subject was also better able to defend against adversaries in flanking positions.
It only required a verbal component.
